description: Started glyphs.
Worked on talent calculator UI.
Changed secondary color to blue gray.
Implemented minified urls for talent calculator.
Add mouse wheel up / down for adding / removing talent points.
Better looking counter for talents.
Make all talent tooltips same width.
Fix tooltip resize when content changes.
Fix extra height being added to page when adding tooltips.
Minor bug fixes and optimizations
Add arrows to talent calculator.
Minor bug fixes.
Fixed tooltip position when scrolling.
Fixed elements showing over header when scrolling.
Change constants from service to global vars.
Load tooltips and class talent details with resolve.
Talents with no points in them inactive when no points remaining.
Talent tooltips implemented.
First changelog entries.
Created a custom tooltip.
Started talent calculator.
Add point to talents works & url updates.
Remove point from talents works as well.
Other small bug fixes in talent calculator.
